data.author: Thomas Denewiler
data.message:
Use a Python virtual environment when installing Python dependencies with pip. (#23)

* Use a Python virtual environment when installing Python dependencies with pip.

* Add codecov token to CI.

* Specifying ubuntu 22.04 for workflow to run on as the new 24.04 runner seems to break our python setup.
---------

Co-authored-by: Alexander Xydes <alexander.l.xydes.civ@us.navy.mil>

data.author: Alexander Xydes
data.message: Adding changelog section for first ros 2 package release.

data.author: Thomas Denewiler
data.message:
CI fixes. (#22)

* Remove sudo from pip install. Use setup-node action.

* Use setup-python.

* Switch back to ros setup.sh.

* Add Jazzy distro. Sort by EOL.

data.author: Thomas Denewiler
data.message:
Add LGPLv3 license to package.xml. (#21)

Add comment LGPLv3 is only for `rqt_dotgraph/xdot_qt.py`. All other
files are covered by CC0 license.

data.author: Alexander Xydes
data.message:
Automatically zooming to fit dotgraph only the first time a graph is â€¦ (#4)

Automatically zooming to fit dotgraph only the first time a graph is received on a topic. Also properly destroying old subscription. Zooming to fit upon loading dotgraph file.

Signed-off-by: Alexander Xydes <alexander.xydes@navy.mil>
